TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WebPartDisplayModeCollection extends System.Collections.CollectionBase
Public NotInheritable Class WebPartDisplayModeCollection Inherits CollectionBase
public ref class WebPartDisplayModeCollection sealed : System::Collections::CollectionBase

span.span: Contains a collection of objects.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別設計成包含作為集合物件。The class is designed to contain a collection of objects. 它主要供管理集合的控制項物件。It is used primarily by the control to manage collections of objects. 顯示模式是特殊的 Web 網頁上將它指派為目前的顯示模式時出現的檢視屬性。A display mode is a special view of a Web page that appears when it is assigned as the current display mode on the property. 顯示模式用來建立使用者可實現特殊的工作，例如編輯控制項，或重新整理頁面配置的頁面檢視設定的 Web 組件控制項中。Display modes are used in the Web Parts control set to create page views in which users can carry out special tasks, such as editing controls, or rearranging the layout of a page. 控制定義數種顯示模式，包括， ， ， ，和。The control defines several display modes, including , , , , and . 所參考的顯示模式集合屬性。The collection of display modes is referenced by the property. 在任何特定網頁使用 Web 組件控制項，只有特定的顯示模式可用。On any particular Web page that uses Web Parts controls, only certain display modes are available. 預設瀏覽模式和設計模式幾乎永遠都可以使用，但其對應的區域類型會出現在頁面上，才可以使用其他的顯示模式。The default browse mode and the design mode are nearly always available, but the other display modes are available only if their corresponding zone types are present on the page. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱類別概觀。For more information, see the class overview. 會追蹤控制項的頁面上的可用顯示模式其屬性。The control keeps track of the available display modes on a page with its property. 這個屬性會參考物件，其中包含所有支援的顯示模式。This property references a object that contains all the supported display modes. 類別沒有公開的建構函式，因此您無法建立您自己的新執行個體。The class does not have an exposed constructor, so you cannot create your own new instance of it. 如果您建立自訂物件，並想要在支援的顯示模式集合的一部分控制項，您必須繼承自類別，覆寫方法，呼叫基底方法，以建立集合，然後新增至集合的任何自訂的顯示模式使用其方法。If you create a custom object and want it to be part of the collection of supported display modes in the control, you must inherit from the class, override the method, call the base method to create the collection, and then add any custom display modes to the collection by using its method. 類別有兩個公用屬性。The class has two public properties. 屬性是唯讀屬性，指出集合是否唯讀。The property is a read-only property that indicates whether the collection is read-only. 多載屬性會提供存取集合的成員。The overloaded property provides access to the members of the collection. 類別也有數種方法。The class also has several methods. 方法時，先前所述，可讓您新增物件加入集合。The method, already mentioned, enables you to add objects to the collection. 方法會判斷集合中是否存在特定顯示模式。The method determines whether a particular display mode exists in the collection. 方法從集合複製到物件的陣列。The method copies the collection to an array of objects. 方法會傳回集合中特定的顯示模式的索引。The method returns the index of a particular display mode within the collection. 最後，方法可讓您在集合中特定的索引處插入顯示模式物件。Finally, the method enables you to insert a display mode object at a particular index in the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用類別。The following code example demonstrates working with the class. 重點是您必須繼承自類別並覆寫方法來新增自訂物件所建立集合控制項。The key point is that you must inherit from the class and override the method to add a custom object to the collection created by the control. 這個程式碼範例包含五個部分：This code example has five parts: - 使用者控制項，可讓您變更 Web 組件頁面上的顯示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 裝載其他控制項的網頁。A Web page that hosts the other controls. - 使用者控制項位於區域在網頁上，並可讓您輸入並顯示在標籤中的文字。A user control that resides in a zone on the Web page, and enables you to enter and display text in a label. - 原始程式碼檔，其中包含兩個控制項。A source code file that contains two controls. 其中一個是自訂控制項等控制項，另一個方法是自訂来加入至頁面的預設顯示模式物件。One is a custom control; the other is a custom object to add to the page's default display modes. - 此範例的運作方式的說明。An explanation of how the example works. 程式碼範例，可讓您變更顯示模式的使用者控制項的第一個部分的程式碼來自另一個主題。The source code for the first part of the code example, the user control that lets you change display modes, comes from another topic. 對於程式碼範例能夠運作，您需要取得的使用者控制項的.ascx 檔案[逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上的顯示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)主題，並放置在.aspx 頁面，在此程式碼範例中的相同資料夾中的檔案。For this code example to work, you need to obtain the .ascx file for the user control from the [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0) topic, and place the file in the same folder as the .aspx page in this code example. 此範例的第二個部分是網頁。The second part of the example is the Web page. 它包含兩個控制項，使用者控制項和自訂控制項。It contains two controls, both user controls, and the custom control. 請注意`Register`在頁面頂端的指示詞參考的使用者控制項和編譯控制項的命名空間。Notice the `Register` directives at the top of the page to reference the user controls and namespace for the compiled controls. [!code-aspx-csharp[Webparts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes/CS/createDisplayModeCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Webparts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes/VB/createDisplayModeVB.aspx#1)] 此範例的第三個部分是輸入和顯示文字的使用者控制項。The third part of the example is the user control for entering and displaying text. 請注意，它會使用控制項來建立多個檢視的使用者介面 (UI)。Notice that it uses a control to create multiple views of the user interface (UI). 按鈕，另一個則不會顯示一個檢視。One view is displayed with the button, the other without. 請注意，在覆寫`OnPreRender`方法時，程式碼會檢查是否頁面目前是自訂的顯示模式，，，因此，它會顯示使用者控制項，其中包含按鈕的第一個檢視。Notice that the in the overridden `OnPreRender` method, the code checks to see whether the page is currently in the custom display mode, and if so, it displays the first view of the user control, which includes the button. 如果頁面未處於自訂顯示模式 （例如，如果頁面是在瀏覽或設計模式），則會隱藏按鈕。If the page is not in the custom display mode (for example, if the page is in browse or design mode), the button is hidden. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[Webparts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes/CS/TextDisplaycs.ascx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[Webparts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes/VB/TextDisplayvb.ascx#2)] 此範例的第四個部分是兩個自訂類別的原始程式檔。The fourth part of the example is the source file for the two custom classes. 請注意，自訂類別覆寫方法，呼叫基底方法，將所有的預設顯示模式，並將自訂的顯示模式。Notice that the custom class overrides the method, calls the base method to add all the default display modes, and then adds the custom display mode. 自訂顯示模式類別`InLineEditDisplayMode`，只是繼承自、 建構函式，在設定的顯示模式的名稱，並覆寫的數字的基底的屬性，以建立自訂的顯示特性。The custom display mode class, `InLineEditDisplayMode`, simply inherits from , sets the name of the display mode in the constructor, and overrides a number of the base properties to establish the characteristics of the custom display. 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 您可以明確地進行編譯，並將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您的網站 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 如需示範如何編譯的逐步解說，請參閱[逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[Webparts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes/CS/CustomDisplayMode.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Webparts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes/VB/CustomDisplayMode.vb#3)] 若要執行的程式碼範例，請載入瀏覽器中。To run the code example, load the page in a browser. 請注意頁面正在瀏覽模式中，而且沒有按鈕會顯示。Notice that the page is currently in browse mode, and no button is visible. 使用**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項中，變更頁面以**內嵌編輯顯示**模式中，並注意，現在的按鈕會顯示在較低的使用者控制項。Using the **Display Mode** drop-down list control, change the page to **Inline Edit Display** mode, and notice that now the button is visible in the lower user control. 加入一些文字，然後按一下按鈕來更新控制。Add some text, and click the button to update the control. 請注意，頁面顯示會傳回到瀏覽模式中，現在會顯示您輸入的文字，因為頁面尚未在自訂的顯示模式中，會再次隱藏按鈕。Notice that the page display is returned to browse mode, the text you entered is now displayed, and the button is once again hidden because the page is not in the custom display mode.

span.span: A to add to the collection.

summary.span: 將 物件加入至集合。

span.span: Adds a object to the collection.

returns.span: 整數值，表示 在集合中的插入位置。

span.span: An integer value that indicates where the was inserted into the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用方法，以加入新物件到現有物件。You can use the method to add new objects to an existing object. 案例中您需要執行此動作的一個範例是當您建立自訂類別，而您想要將它加入至頁面上的 支援的顯示模式的集合。An example of a scenario in which you would do this is when you create a custom class, and you want to add it to the collection of supported display modes on a page. 若要這樣做，您必須繼承自類別並覆寫其方法，先呼叫基底方法，然後使用方法，以加入至集合的自訂顯示模式。To do that, you must inherit from the class and override its method, first calling the base method, and then using the method to add the custom display mode to the collection. ## Examples 這個程式碼範例示範如何使用類別。This code example demonstrates the use of the class. 如完整的程式碼和指示，才能執行此範例中，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀。For the full code and instructions required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 下列程式碼區段，就會發生中衍生類別會覆寫方法並加入集合中的自訂顯示模式。The following section of code occurs in a derived class that overrides the method and adds a custom display mode to the collection. [!code-csharp[Webparts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes/CS/CustomDisplayMode.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Webparts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes/VB/CustomDisplayMode.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會很有用，如果您有多個物件，以及您需要知道一個物件相對於其他的序數位置 （索引）。The method is useful if you have multiple objects, and you need to know the ordinal position (the index) of one object relative to the others.

A to insert into the collection.

span.span: Inserts a object into the collection at the specified index position.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`index`等於然後集合中的項目數`value`附加至集合結尾。If `index` equals the number of items in the collection, then `value` is appended to the end of the collection.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool IsReadOnly { get; }
.property instance bool IsReadOnly
Public ReadOnly Property IsReadOnly As Boolean
public: property bool IsReadOnly { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，表示集合是否為唯讀。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the collection is read-only.

value.span: 布林值，指出集合是否為唯讀。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether the collection is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性值從內部變更 Web 組件控制項集合，它會變更不同時間點集合的內容。The property value is changed internally by the Web Parts control set as it changes the contents of the collection at different points. 例如，在控制項已加入支援所有的顯示模式，以其集合，它在內部設定成唯讀： 防止變更的物件。For example, after the control has added all supported display modes to its collection, it internally sets the object to read-only to prevent it from being changed. > [!NOTE] > 雖然您可以讀取它的值沒有變更這個屬性值從您的程式碼的機制。There is no mechanism to change this property value from your code, although you can read its value.

summary.span: 根據索引或唯一識別項，取得集合的特定成員。

span.span: Gets a specific member of the collection according to its index or a unique identifier.
